summary: An aspiring novelist enters into a relationship with a woman, though there's just one catch: She's married and the couple can only meet between the hours of 5 and 7 each evening.
cast: Anton Yelchin|Bérénice Marlohe|David Shannon|Lambert Wilson|Amina Robinson|Milo Mungier Jacob|Brune de Drueille Senecterre|Alan Gilbert|Julian Bond|Daniel Boulud|Olivia Thirlby|Pamela Sue Horowitz|Kajsa William-Ollson|Glenn Close|Joseph D'Onofrio|Frank Langella|Dov Tiefenbach|David Remnick|Eric Stoltz|Jocelyn DeBoer|Roger Brenner|Francesco D'Onofrio|Nancy Digonis|Kelly Hartnett|Doris McCarthy|Gregg Micheals|Nancy Ellen Shore|Paul Thornton|Heather Warren
keywords: courage|immature behavior|voice over narration|rejection letter|age difference
title: De 5 a 7
